```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(xml2)
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
```



```{r}
salaries = readxl::read_xlsx("C:/Users/matth/Downloads/baseball salaries (1).xlsx")
```

```{r}
salaries = salaries %>% mutate(FirstName = str_trim(str_split_fixed(player, ", ", n = 2)[, 2]), LastName = str_trim(str_split_fixed(player, ", ", n = 2)[, 1]), player_name = paste(FirstName, LastName))

salaries = salaries %>% mutate(player_full_name = str_replace_all(player_name, "\\*", ""))
```

```{r}
writexl::write_xlsx(salaries, "cleaned salaries")

```
